SELECT t.vendor_id as vendor_id, t.vendor_name as vendor_name, t.city as city, t.legal_person as legal_person, t.mobile as mobile, t.statement_date as statement_date, tm.org_name_parent as request_company FROM pcms_supplier_company f LEFT JOIN tpm_employee te ON te.company= f.company LEFT JOIN tpm_dept tm ON te.org_code = tm.org_code LEFT JOIN pcms_supplier t ON t.vendor_id = f.vendor_id
AND tm.org_name_parent LIKE '%${params.request_company}%'
OR t.vendor_name LIKE '%${params.vendor_name}%'
AND te.person_code = #{params.person_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
